languages.text: "Освободители, настоящие герои! Когда пламенный ад обрушился на наши трущобы, ни один ваш блюститель или офицер не пошевелил пальцем, чтобы нас спасти. А аварийщики инфернус, не щадя себя, доставали наших детей из под завалов, штопали раны, утешали вдов и калек. Они раскрыли нам глаза!"

"The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"
languages.original_text: "Освободители, настоящие герои! Когда пламенный ад обрушился на наши трущобы, ни один ваш блюститель или офицер не пошевелил пальцем, чтобы нас спасти. А аварийщики инфернус, не щадя себя, доставали наших детей из под завалов, штопали раны, утешали вдов и калек. Они раскрыли нам глаза!"

traits.locale_text: "The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery inferno rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. And the inferni went out of their way to pull children from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

"The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery inferno rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. And the inferni went out of their way to pull children from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

"The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery inferno rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the Inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

"The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery inferno rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the Inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

"The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

"The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

languages.text: «¡Los libertadores, nuestros auténticos héroes! Cuando llegó la muerte abrasadora a nuestro suburbio, ni uno de tus guardias levantó un dedo para salvarnos. Fueron los infernus los que se dejaron la piel para sacar a los niños de los escombros, curar nuestras heridas y reconfortar a los viudos. ¡Nos abrieron los ojos!».
languages.original_text: "The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Los libertadores, nuestros auténticos héroes! Cuando llegó la muerte abrasadora a nuestro suburbio, ni uno de tus guardias levantó un dedo para salvarnos. Fueron los infernus los que se dejaron la piel para sacar a los niños de los escombros, curar nuestras heridas y reconfortar a los viudos. ¡Nos abrieron los ojos!».

languages.text: 「解放者たち、真の英雄たちよ！スラム街に炎の如き死が降り注いだ時、あなたたちのエンフォーサーは誰ひとりとして私たちに手を差し伸べなかった。でも、インフェルヌスはその手で瓦礫の下から子供たちを引っ張り出し、傷を癒し、夫を亡くした妻を慰めてくれたわ。彼らは私たちの目を開かせてくれた！」
languages.original_text: "The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

traits.locale_text: 「解放者たち、真の英雄たちよ！スラム街に炎の如き死が降り注いだ時、あなたたちのエンフォーサーは誰ひとりとして私たちに手を差し伸べなかった。でも、インフェルヌスはその手で瓦礫の下から子供たちを引っ張り出し、傷を癒し、夫を亡くした妻を慰めてくれたわ。彼らは私たちの目を開かせてくれた！」

languages.text: “是我们的解放者，我们真正的英雄！死亡像雨点一样落在我们的贫民窟里，可你们的执法者却连根手指头都没动过。控火工会的成员可不一样，他们从废墟下面救出孩子、治疗伤员、安慰失去亲人的人们，他们让我们大开眼界！”
languages.original_text: "The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

traits.locale_text: “是我们的解放者，我们真正的英雄！死亡像雨点一样落在我们的贫民窟里，可你们的执法者却连根手指头都没动过。控火工会的成员可不一样，他们从废墟下面救出孩子、治疗伤员、安慰失去亲人的人们，他们让我们大开眼界！”

languages.text: "Die Befreier, unsere wahren Helden! Als der feurige Tod auf unsere Slums herabregnete, rührte keiner Eurer Enforcers auch nur einen Finger, um uns zu retten. Doch die Inferni haben alles getan, um Kinder aus dem Schutt zu ziehen, Wunden zu versorgen und Witwen zu trösten. Sie haben uns die Augen geöffnet!"
languages.original_text: "The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Befreier, unsere wahren Helden! Als der feurige Tod auf unsere Slums herabregnete, rührte keiner Eurer Enforcers auch nur einen Finger, um uns zu retten. Doch die Inferni haben alles getan, um Kinder aus dem Schutt zu ziehen, Wunden zu versorgen und Witwen zu trösten. Sie haben uns die Augen geöffnet!"

languages.text: « Les libérateurs, nos vrais héros ! Quand la mort s'est abattue sur les bas quartiers, aucun de vos prévôts n'a ne serait-ce que levé le petit doigt pour nous aider. Les inferni, eux, ont tout risqué pour extirper les enfants des décombres, soigner les blessures et réconforter les veuves. Ils nous ont ouvert les yeux ! »
languages.original_text: "The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"

traits.locale_text: « Les libérateurs, nos vrais héros ! Quand la mort s'est abattue sur les bas quartiers, aucun de vos prévôts n'a ne serait-ce que levé le petit doigt pour nous aider. Les inferni, eux, ont tout risqué pour extirper les enfants des décombres, soigner les blessures et réconforter les veuves. Ils nous ont ouvert les yeux ! »

languages.text: "Kurtarıcılarımız, gerçek kahramanlarımız! Varoşlarımıza ölüm yağarken infazcılarınızdan biri dahi parmağını kıpırdatmadı. Ama itfacılar ; molozların altından yavrularımızı kurtarmak, yaralılarla ilgilenmek ve dulları teselli etmek için işlerini güçlerini bıraktılar. Gözümüzü açtılar!"
languages.original_text: "The liberators, our true heroes! When the fiery death rained down on our slums, not one of your enforcers lifted a finger to save us. But the inferni went out of their way to pull children out from under the rubble, mend wounds, and comfort widows. They opened our eyes!"
